text: George Wald (November 18, 1906 â€“ April 12, 1997) was an American scientist. He won the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine in 1967 (with Ragnar Granit and Haldan Keffer Hartline) for his discoveries in vision. He was born on November 18, 1906 in New York City and died on April 12, 1997 in Cambridge, Massachusettes, United States. ==References== Category:1906 births Category:1997 deaths Category:scientists from New York City Category:American biologists Category:American Nobel Prize winners
title: George Wald
